DOC.brief_summary: The aim of this trial was to characterise the intra and post operative metabolic, endocrine and inflammatory response to laparoscopic fundoplication in children. We are testing the hypothesis that laparoscopic fundoplication is associated with a lack of hypermetabolism and catabolism and blunting of the endocrine/inflammatory stress response
DOC.brief_title: Laparoscopy in Children: Does it Decrease the Metabolic, Endocrine and Inflammatory Stress Response to Surgery
DOC.criteria: infants and children with gastrooesophageal reflux septic shock, multiorgan dysfunction syndrome, cardiac, renal or congenital metabolic abnormalities
